Text: Is this a sick joke, or a healthy hoax?

Actually I can affirm that this does indeed seem to be legit. I have used KGB for awhile and I know it does tightly compress content. According to my installed version of KGB (there is a portable version that is in the download, I don't know if it works or not though) the uncompressed files which is currently sitting in a .kgb archive is a 2.2 GB ISO. When it is uncompressed, I will check the file out using some precautions and if I think to later I will report back.
